block.p: Kathleen Anne Devers, the daughter of Mary O'Hanlon Devers and Peter Dix Devers of New York, was married yesterday to Arthur Lee Sawyer, a son of Barbara Allen Sawyer and Dr. H. G. Sawyer Jr. of Mystic, Conn. The Rev. Robert Michael Dunn, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of St. Thomas More in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Sawyer work in Los Angeles. She supervises bookkeepers for the Cheesecake Factory Restaurants there. He is a vice president of Sylvan Ivy Prep and the general manager of Ivy West, test preparation divisions of Sylvan Learning Systems.

Kathleen Anne Devers, the daughter of Mary O'Hanlon Devers and Peter Dix Devers of New York, was married yesterday to Arthur Lee Sawyer, a son of Barbara Allen Sawyer and Dr. H. G. Sawyer Jr. of Mystic, Conn. The Rev. Robert Michael Dunn, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at the Church of St. Thomas More in New York.

Mr. and Mrs. Sawyer work in Los Angeles. She supervises bookkeepers for the Cheesecake Factory Restaurants there. He is a vice president of Sylvan Ivy Prep and the general manager of Ivy West, test preparation divisions of Sylvan Learning Systems.
The bride, 31, graduated from St. Michael's College in Winooski, Vt. Her father is a lawyer, and her mother teaches physical education at Humanities High School, both in New York.
The bridegroom, 35, graduated magna cum laude from Harvard. His mother is a reference librarian at the Groton, Conn., Public Library. His father, a dentist, practices in Groton.
